abstract: A day after a strong run on Wall Street, investors took a pause and the major stock averages drifted lower in midday trading.
snippet: A day after a strong run on Wall Street, investors took a pause and the major stock averages drifted lower in midday trading.
lead_paragraph: A day after a spirited rally sent the Dow to its highest levels since the beginning of the financial crisis, Wall Street took a moment to breathe, with stocks showing little or no gains on Tuesday.

headline.main: Wall St. Takes a Breather and Shares Close Flat
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Takes a Breather And Shares Close Flat
